desc: The Buckstik is a simple to use interactive deer attractant designed to attract dominant bucks and keep them coming back on a regular basis. The artificial buckstik serves as a licking branch, rubbing post, and mock scrape in one. Draw deer in and keep them coming in with the Buckstik.

layout.text: BUCKSTIK: ALL IN ONE LICKING BRANCH, RUBBING POST, AND MOCK SCRAPE.

BUCKSTIK IS THE MOST EFFECTIVE ALL IN ONE LICKING BRANCH, RUBBING POST, AND MOCK SCRAPE SYSTEM THAT PRESENTS THE 3 MAIN GLANDS GLANDS DEER USE TO COMMUNICATE AT JUST THE RIGHT HEIGHT. IT IS THE SINGLE BEST WAY TO INVENTORY, PATTERN, AND HUNT WHITETAIL DEER.
BUCKSTIK PRODUCTS ARE DESIGNED TO BE SET UP IN SECONDS, HOLD AND RETAIN DEER DNA AS THEY INTERACT, BE EASILY TRANSPORTED FROM PROPERTY TO PROPERTY, AND CREATE A CONSISTENT AND REGULAR TRAVEL PATTERN FOR DEER ALL SEASON LONG.
AVAILABLE IN BOTH VERTICAL (BUCKSTIK) AND HORIZONTAL (BUCKBRANCH) CONFIGURATIONS.
